description: Life reflection and future planning app combining philosophical frameworks (Ikigai, Memento Mori, 4000 Weeks, Bronnie Ware Regrets) with AI-generated narratives. Users input birth year, profile, and life experiences to visualize their mortality, discover purpose, and plan intentionally.

acceptanceCriteria: Create lifelens/index.html with basic HTML5 structure

Container max-width 900px, centered
Typecheck passes
